Package org.knime.core.webui.data.rpc.json.impl

Class JsonRpcSingleServer<S>

java.lang.Object
org.knime.core.webui.data.rpc.json.impl.JsonRpcSingleServer<S>
Type Parameters:
S - the node data service interface type; defines which methods are offered by the node model to retrieve data. See also JsonRpcClient for requirements on this interface.
All Implemented Interfaces:
RpcServer, RpcSingleServer<S>
public class JsonRpcSingleServer<S> extends Object implements RpcSingleServer<S>
A convenience specialization of JsonRpcServer that supports only one service interface and thus spares the user from specifying the service interface name every time. If this single json rpc server is used, only the method name is required to address the node data service in the JSON-RPC request from the client.
Since:
4.3
Author:
Martin Horn, KNIME GmbH, Konstanz, Germany, Carl Witt, KNIME AG, Zurich, Switzerland
